title: Vampires at Midnight
description: This remarkable anthology contains eighteen terrifying tales of the Vampire, that most dread horror of the darker world. In these macabre accounts, you will meet the ghastly creatures who, once dead, continue to live in their graves and drink the warm blood of the living. If you doubt the existence of these ghoulish spirits, the fluttering of your nerves will belie you.If fiends are your fascination, come and meet them in the form of a lovely young girl or an old - indeed very old - friend, in the snows of wind-washed Wisconsin or in the gruesome ruins of Greece. Come and be introduced...in eighteen eerie encounters.
author: Peter Haining
